duties_responsibilities.duty: Generate prospective customer base and advertise insurance products via networking, referrals, cold calling, and company leads.
Evaluate new customers' insurance needs, risk, existing coverage, goals, and financial status through consultations to provide a tailored experience.
Manage electronic and paper records, ensure all contracting paperwork is kept current, and attend weekly meetings and training.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or GED required; Bachelor's degree desired. Life & Health insurance license required.
